home.metaDescription: CUTool - Online tools and resources for everyone. Easy to use, reliable, comprehensive. Developer tools, everyday tools, AI daily, tutorials; verification uses authorized data sources, transparent pricing, secure—use with confidence.
home.heroSubtitle: Easy to use · Reliable · Comprehensive · Anytime, anywhere—solve problems with confidence
home.introTagline: Tools and resources for everyone, reliable and always there
home.introDesc: CUTool serves both developers and everyday users with tools, resources, tutorials, and professional verification services. Verification uses authorized data sources, with transparent pricing and secure handling of your data—so you can use it with confidence. We focus on ease of use, reliability, and breadth.

introSlides.tagline: Tools and resources for everyone, reliable and always there
introSlides.desc: CUTool serves both developers and everyday users with tools, resources, tutorials, and professional verification services. Verification uses authorized data sources, with transparent pricing and secure handling of your data—so you can use it with confidence. We focus on ease of use, reliability, and breadth.

introSlides.tagline: Easy to use, reliable, comprehensive—all in one place
introSlides.desc: Wide range of tools: JSON, timestamps, text, encoding, code formatting for developers, plus everyday utilities. Resources and tutorials: AI Daily, Prompt and Agent tutorials, regularly updated. Verification: authorized data sources, transparent pricing, secure data handling, compliant use—query with confidence. Reliable service: use in the browser, maintained—available whenever you need it.

introSlides.tagline: Anytime, anywhere—development, work, learning, and verification
introSlides.desc: Format, convert, and process text while developing; look up resources and follow tutorials for work and learning; when you need verification, use our professional service—authorized channels, clear pricing, data used only for the query at hand, secure and reliable. No install, no local footprint—just open the browser and go.

introSlides.tagline: Dev and everyday tools, ready to use
introSlides.desc: JSON format and compare, timestamp conversion, Cron expressions, text processing and compare, word count, regex match, Base64/URL encode-decode, code formatting, and more—for development and daily use. Free, no install, use in the browser.

introSlides.tagline: Daily AI industry news and summaries
introSlides.desc: Daily roundup of AI industry news with concise summaries and source links—models, product launches, trends. Browse by date and history so you can stay on top of AI with less time.

introSlides.tagline: Prompt and Agent skills, step by step
introSlides.desc: Prompt tutorials from basics to advanced, with writing tips and best practices; Agent skills cover AI Agent use cases and techniques. Content is updated regularly to help you get more from AI tools.

AI Token calculator estimates tokens for text and images and supports major models; AI directory lists popular AI products and tools for discovery and comparison. Useful for development and tool selection.

Phone two-factor/three-factor verification and online status; vehicle information and insurance queries; bank card three-factor verification. Authorized data sources, transparent pricing, secure data, used only for the current query—use with confidence.

introSlides.tagline: Browser and IDE plugins, use anywhere
introSlides.desc: Chrome extension and JetBrains IDEA plugin let you use CUTool from the sidebar or inside the IDE without switching tabs—faster workflow wherever you work.

store.title: Install from Chrome Web Store
store.description: Recommended installation method with automatic updates.
store.step1: Click the "Install from Chrome Store" button below
store.step2: Click "Add to Chrome" on the Chrome Web Store page
store.step3: Click "Add Extension" in the confirmation popup to complete installation

offline.title: Offline Installation
offline.description: If you cannot access the Chrome Web Store, you can install using the offline package.
offline.step1: Click the "Download Offline Package" button below to download the extension zip file
offline.step2: Extract the downloaded zip file to a local folder
offline.step3: Enter chrome://extensions/ in Chrome's address bar and press Enter
offline.step4: Enable "Developer mode" in the top right corner of the extensions page
offline.step5: Click "Load unpacked" and select the extracted folder to complete installation

images.download: Click download button to get the plugin
